snippet: Twitter on its first day of trading managed to avoid the missteps that marred Facebook’s debut. | UBS said it repurchased the remaining value of a portfolio of troubled assets from Switzerland’s central bank. | Canadian, American and Qatari...
abstract: Twitter on its first day of trading managed to avoid the missteps that marred Facebook’s debut. | UBS said it repurchased the remaining value of a portfolio of troubled assets from Switzerland’s central bank. | Canadian, American and Qatari investors are helping to finance a planned $1 billion investment in BlackBerry. | A plumber in London is seeking to fix the European banking sector.
